name: Neon Serpent Dome
description: A dazzling, multi-tiered arena in Neo-Tokyo, famous for its holographic displays and an electrifying atmosphere.

name: Zero-G Octagon
description: A cutting-edge arena on Lunar Colony Alpha, where gravity projectors can be manipulated for unique match physics.

name: Red Sand Pit
description: A brutal, open-air pit carved into the Martian landscape, where only the toughest survive. Dust storms are a common hazard.

name: Aqua Colosseum
description: An exquisite underwater arena in Atlantis Reborn, with transparent domes offering views of marine life. Acoustics are unique.

name: The Old School Hall
description: A historical arena, preserved from the 20th century. Known for its traditional crowd and classic atmosphere.
